data.title: Anatole France – Documentary
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1921 was awarded to Anatole France "in recognition of his brilliant literary achievements, characterized as they are by a nobility of style, a profound human sympathy, grace, and a true Gallic temperament"
data.text:
Anatole France

Documentary

Your browser does not support the video tag.

A clip of Anatole France after he arrived in Stockholm for the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony held on 10 December 1921. He is greeted by, among others, 1921 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate Hjalmar Branting.

From SF Veckorevy 1921-12-12.

Your browser does not support the video tag.

A clip of Anatole France celebrating his 80th birthday.

From SF Veckorevy 1921-12-12.
